name: Race+
overview: Up to 8 players can race using the poly.play controller adapter in this fun racing game. This is your RACE! Drive through the wild countryside, the vast desert,and past the gleaming skyscrapers of the city. Experience amazing car physics. Challenge friends for thrilling competitions. Discover new tracks by collecting stars. Customize the gameplay to your individual needs. Choose from 768 race tracks Crash opponents in three different car battle arenas Drive against robots Up to 8 players SuperPad64 compatible
